nodes.text: Larek was a male Arcona doctor affiliated with the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Around 3641 BBY Larek was investigating Rakatan ruins on Belsavis, particularly Stasis vault 113, in which he sent several droids to recover valuable memory cores. However, the droids failed to return and Larek was forced to ask a Republic representative in the area to retrieve the cores from the droids manually.
Doctor Larek appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a hologram on Belsavis, where he begins the mission "Unheard Frequencies".
